/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Power lines crisscross above, connecting the buildings and adding a sense of dynamism to the scene. In the distance, construction cranes can be seen, a testament to the city's continuous growth and development. The sun shines brightly in the top left corner of the image, casting long shadows and illuminating the scene with a warm glow.
